revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tohjo Falls |image = [[File:Tohjo Falls.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Tohjo Falls. |tokens = 6,750 |location = Route 27, near New Bark Town. }} '''Tohjo Falls''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 127,750 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- !..."
